channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-1390|2024-08-05T03:59:38.629Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for Check Services for Multi-Platform 3.0, 3.0.2, and 3.0.2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 138221.

item.title: CVE-2018-1391|2024-08-05T03:59:38.991Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager 3.0.4 and 3.1.0 for ACH Services for Multi-Platform could allow an authenticated user to execute a specially crafted command that could cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 138376.

item.title: CVE-2018-1393|2024-08-05T03:59:39.031Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for ACH Services for Multi-Platform 3.0.6 could allow an authenticated user to execute a specially crafted command that could obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 138378.

item.title: CVE-2018-1392|2024-08-05T03:59:39.009Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager 3.0.4 and 3.1.0 for ACH Services for Multi-Platform could allow an authenticated user to execute a specially crafted command that could obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 138377.
